item.title: PROJECT NAME
item.description: PROJECT NAME View the project here (2021-2022 page) and here (main page). Overview *NOTE: While the project is already underway for the 2021-2022 school year, this is an annually recurring project that has been going for six years already and will absolutely run again next year. If you are interested in having your class participate Growing Beyond EarthÂ® (GBE) is a classroom-based citizen science project operated in partnership with NASA. It includes a series of plant experiments conducted by students using equipment similar to the Vegetable Production System (Veggie) on the International Space Station.
